p: Prochaetoviridin A 230 was evaluated for its antifungal activities against 5 pathogenic fungi S. sclerotiorum, B. cinerea, F. graminearum, P. capsici and F. moniliforme at the concentration of 20 Âµg/mL. It showed moderate antifungal activity with inhibition rates ranging from 13.7% to 39.0% [ 69].
